abstract: The epic battle engulfed two courts and pitted a cast of bankers, lawyers and federal regulators against one another.
snippet: The epic battle engulfed two courts and pitted a cast of bankers, lawyers and federal regulators against one another.
lead_paragraph: A showdown between two of the nation’s largest banks over the Wachovia Corporation grew into a widening battle involving two courts and a cast including Federal Reserve Chairman Ben S. Bernanke and an army of bankers, lawyers and other regulators trying to resolve the fate Sunday of one of the biggest prizes to emerge from the credit crisis.

headline.main: Weekend Legal Frenzy Between Citigroup and Wells Fargo for Wachovia

abstract: The increasingly messy fight over Wachovia spilled over into federal district court in lower Manhattan Sunday afternoon, as lawyers of various stripes assembled to argue over the Charlotte bank’s proposed $15.1 billion merger with Wells Fargo.
snippet: The increasingly messy fight over Wachovia spilled over into federal district court in lower Manhattan Sunday afternoon, as lawyers of various stripes assembled to argue over the Charlotte bank’s proposed $15.1 billion merger with Wells Fargo.
lead_paragraph: The increasingly messy fight over Wachovia spilled over into federal district court in lower Manhattan Sunday afternoon, as lawyers of various stripes assembled to argue over the Charlotte bank’s proposed $15.1 billion merger with Wells Fargo.

abstract: After a weekend full of legal drama and reversals of fortune, the Deal Professor surveys the state of play as of Sunday night.
snippet: After a weekend full of legal drama and reversals of fortune, the Deal Professor surveys the state of play as of Sunday night.
lead_paragraph: As Eric Dash and Jonathan D. Glater of The New York Times have ably chronicled, this past weekend has been a mess of litigation between a scorned Citigroup and new lovebirds Wells Fargo and Wachovia.

headline.main: The Mad Legal Dash for Wachovia

abstract: Citigroup finally filed its complaint against Wachovia, Wells Fargo and a slew of other individuals in New York state court on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup finally filed its complaint against Wachovia, Wells Fargo and a slew of other individuals in New York state court on Monday.

headline.main: At Last, the Citi N.Y. State Complaint

abstract: Citigroup and Wells Fargo agreed to a cease-fire until Wednesday in the legal warfare over their bids for the Wachovia Corporation.
snippet: Citigroup and Wells Fargo agreed to a cease-fire until Wednesday in the legal warfare over their bids for the Wachovia Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Prodded by the Federal Reserve, Citigroup and Wells Fargo agreed to a cease-fire until Wednesday in the legal warfare over their competing bids for the Wachovia Corporation.
